title: Explicit solutions of the Bass and SI models on hypernetworks
authors: Gadi Fibich, Juan G. Restrepo, Guy Rothmann
abstract:
We analyze the Bass model and the Susceptible-Infected (SI) model on
hypergraphs with 3-body interactions. We derive the master equations for
general hypernetworks, and use them to obtain explicit expressions for the
expected adoption/infection level on infinite complete hypernetworks, infinite
Erd\H{o}s-R\'enyi hypernetworks, and on infinite hyperlines. These expressions
are exact, as they are derived without making any approximation.
